text: Kim Tae-hyung (born December 30, 1995) is a South Korean singer-songwriter, record producer and actor. He is also better known mononymously as V and Taehyung. He is known for being a member and one of the four vocalists of the South Korean Boy group BTS. He has a dog named Yeontan. title: V (singer)
